# Position 4: Judi Montes

###### **Who is councilmember judi montes?**

Councilmember Judi Montes is a Granger Spartan at heart. She has resided in the community as a child, graduated from Granger High School, and is a community resident along with her constituents. Councilmember Montes practices compassion, empowerment, and conviction in all spheres of her heart work. She values the future of the City of Granger and the importance of lifting our youth by serving as a coach, mentor, and educator. Councilmember Montes extends her knowledge of life, professionalism, and educational experiences in efforts to encourage and motivate others who are in pursuit of their goals and aspirations.

###### **experience**

Councilmember Montes served as a past Treasurer and currently serves as a standing member of the Granger Lions Club. Moreover, she continuously serves the Granger School District as a member of the PTO organization of the Granger Middle School. She is a member of the Granger Wellness Coalition, the Granger Christmas Holiday Parade, and a past member of the Radio KDNA. Her widespread efforts and commitment to the youth of Granger yields her the opportunity to advocate for access to resources and information to the youth through her vast connections and networks with the Granger School District and Early Childhood Education programs.

###### **term expires**

December 2027

###### **Contact councilmember montes**

Phone: (509) 854-1725  
Email: [judi.montes@grangerwa.org](mailto:judi.montes@grangerwa.org)
